item.title: CVE-2021-38317|2024-09-16T21:08:08.299Z -- konnichiwa%21%20membership -- konnichiwa%21%20membership
item.description: The Konnichiwa! Membership WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the plan_id parameter in the ~/views/subscriptions.html.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 0.8.3.
